articles.author: Gerrit De Vynck
articles.title: Trump’s tech deals break with U.S. traditions of free enterprise - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump’s announcement that the U.S. government will take a stake in Intel follows deals with Apple, Nvidia and AMD that also entangled corporations with the state.
articles.content:
Trumps announcement that the U.S. government will take a stake in Intel follows deals with Apple, Nvidia and AMD that also entangled corporations with the state.

articles.author: Kerry  Breen
articles.title: A restaurant owner wasn't regaining function after a stroke. New technology changed everything. - CBS News
articles.description: Tommy Fello struggled to regain function after a stroke affected the left side of his body. A new technology is making a difference.
articles.content: Restaurateur Tommy Fello was driving from his Ohio establishment to his house on Christmas Eve when he started veering off the road. Fello, then 71, had been awake since 4 a.m. local time preparing a… [+7059 chars]

articles.author: Jacek Krywko
articles.title: An inner-speech decoder reveals some mental privacy issues - Ars Technica
articles.description: Words you’ll never speak still cause activity in the brain’s speech centers.
